block.p: SAFRO-Paul. Beloved husband of Rose and the late Miriam. Loving father of Julia & Robert Edelman, Marti & Leonard Kutnik, Naomi Kolbrenner, Adele & Joseph Browdy, and Lee & Jerry Tresser, Miriam & Ivan Fulop, Roy Roth. Cherished grandfather of Allen & Suzanne, Linda & Michael, Michael, Marc & Shawn, Scott and Caryn, Adam, Seth, Michelle & Keith, Jordan, Cherilynn & David, Jodi, Jared, Michael & Alex. Greatgrandfather of Matthew, Samantha, Benjamin, Nicole, Jacob, Casey, Alexa. Dear brother of Judy Korn, Ruth and Ben Cohen, Bonnie and the late Al Safro. Adored uncle. Certified public accountant, senior partner of Fox & Co. Member of NYS Society of CPAs. Author of many tax books. Former President of Bnai Zion and Kfar Masada. Former member of General Council of World Zionist Organizations. Temple Beth-El of Cedarhurst, Temple Emanuel of Palm Beach. Associate and Founder of Hadassah. Board of Directors of Jewish Federation of Palm Beach, UJA United Israel Appeal, American Friends of Tel Aviv University, Beth Hatefutsoth, World Jewish Congress, Israel Bond Organization, Flushing National Bank. Founder of Eleanor Roosevelt Institute for Cancer Research of South Shore. Exhibited a great generosity of spirit, will be sorely missed by all. Donations to Hadassah, Beth Hatefutsoth. Services Tuesday, 11:15 AM, at Boulevard Riverside, 1450 Broadway, Hewlett, LI.
